question:
Energy in Human Body can be stored in the form of?
  1. Carbohydrates
  2. Fats
  3. Proteins
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Store of Energy in Human Body: Carbohydrates Glycogen (approx 500 gms in average human) in liver and skeletal muscles. Lipids Adipose tissue. Healthy adult males have 12-18 percent body fat; healthy adult females have 12-25 percent body fat. Proteins Throughout the body; last choice as energy source.
